parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Ensures idempotency of the request. Generate a unique value for this parameter from your client to ensure it is unique across different requests. ClientToken supports only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
Region ID. Allowed values:

- cn-hangzhou: East China 1 (Hangzhou).

- ap-southeast-1: Singapore.
